hero.title: Logistics solutions for Construction
hero.description: We supply your construction site with materials, equipment and spare parts at the exact time.

intro.text: At Yobel SCM we design logistics solutions for the construction sector. We manage warehousing, scheduled distribution and value-added services to ensure continuous material flow according to each project's progress.

items.title: On-Site Warehousing
items.description: We manage inventories directly on-site or at our facilities, with WMS technology and material control by batch or project.

items.title: Scheduled Distribution
items.description: We plan routes and deliveries according to construction schedule, avoiding delays and unnecessary logistics costs.

items.title: Technical Courier
items.description: Urgent deliveries of samples, plans or critical parts with real-time traceability to avoid stopping operations.

items.title: Value-Added Services (VAS)
items.description: Kitting and installation or maintenance kit assembly ready for immediate use at the assembly point.

items.title: Foreign Trade
items.description: We coordinate import and dispatch of machinery, supplies and specialized materials from anywhere in the world.

benefits.title: Punctuality, control and availability
items: Reduced downtime due to material shortages.
Inventory control and visibility by project or phase.
Integration with client ERP systems or platforms.

items.title: Phase-based supply
items.fullDesc: Scheduled material deliveries strictly according to construction progress.

items.title: Critical spare parts
items.fullDesc: Urgent courier service with full traceability for stopped machinery.

items.title: Tool control
items.fullDesc: Registration, monitoring and efficient rotation of field assets.

items.title: Installation kits
items.fullDesc: Assembly and delivery of grouped components by batch or assembly point.

items.title: Import management
items.fullDesc: Comprehensive logistics coordination of machinery or specialized supplies.

certificates.description: We operate with international certifications that guarantee quality, safety and efficiency in every project.
